alert.note: Alert for Allen (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 28 at 3:04PM EST until March 02 at 7:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Ohio... Maumee River near Defiance affecting Defiance and Henry Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio... Indiana... Saint Joseph River Ohio below Montpelier affecting Williams County. Saint Joseph River Ohio near St. Joe River Ft. Wayne affecting Allen IN County. Saint Joseph River Ohio near Newville affecting Defiance, Allen IN and De Kalb Counties. Tiffin River at Stryker affecting Defiance, Williams and Fulton OH Counties. North Branch Elkhart River at Cosperville affecting Noble County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saint Joseph River Ohio near St. Joe River Ft. Wayne. * WHEN...From this evening to Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Lowland and farmland flooding near the river begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 11.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.0 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further statements and updated forecasts. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
